title: What was the number one song in July 1970? - Quora

response.answer_text: The following refers to the UK chart. On the 1st of July 1970 the No1 spot was occupied by  "In The Summertime" by Mungo Jerry, with  "All Right Now" by Free at No2, and  "Groovin` With Mr.Bloe" by Mr Bloe at No3 Things remained like that until the 12th of July when Mr Bloe was replaced by  "Up Around The Bend" by Creedence Clearwater Revival On the 19th, CCR were replaced at No3 by  "The Wonder of You" by Elvis Presley. It was only on the last chart of the month (the 26th), that the top spot changed, with  "The Wonder of You" by Elvis Presley at No1,  "All Right Now" by Free at No2, and  "Lola" by The Kinks finally getting into the top 3 after spending three weeks at No4.

Three Dog Night sang the number one hit in July 1970. Mama told me(not to come) There were 14 different groups that had their first number one hit in 1970 so almost every few weeks there was a new number one.
